s_title: Deep Dungeon IV - Kuro no Youjutsushi
s_synopsis: In a world split by the countries of East in West, you, the nameless hero of the game, have to travel from town to town and from dungeon to dungeon, fighting hordes of monsters and discovering treasure, in order to face in the final battle the greatest sorcerer of the world, who was responsible for the death of your father.
